#summary Instructions on how to restore the desktop shortcuts.

After you run LotRO MIDI Player once from this website, you should have a shortcut on your desktop.  If you don't have a desktop shortcut, follow these instructions to restore them.

  # Open the Java Control panel, and under Temporary Internet Files, click View...
    http://i4.photobucket.com/albums/y123/digero/lotro/JavaControlPanel.jpg
  # Select LotRO MIDI Player from the list, and click the shortcut button to install shortcuts.
    http://i4.photobucket.com/albums/y123/digero/lotro/JavaCacheViewer.jpg
